pages.text: Flimsy but plentiful, found commonly on exposed stone surfaces like cliffs or in the shallower levels of caves.$(br2)Not much can be done with it; some basic tools and weapons, possibly.

Perhaps I can process it or refine it in some way? I'd need to set up a dependable area to work in, though.$(br2)Regardless, I should collect all that I can find, in case it ends up being useful down the line.
